text: Hi Roshaan! Really sorry but my phone got stolen and so I wiped everything off it! I then plugged it into iTunes to restore it but the slack app never reloaded so I haven’t been receiving any notifications or anything for it! Only when Emma messaged me did I realise that I don’t have the app anymore! Sooo so soo sorry about that!

Also seen now my reply to your question didn’t send through either.. anyway.. in response to your long awaited question (sorry again) in regards to jobs within biology you are correct in thinking the main avenues related specifically to the degree are research and teaching/ a combination of the two if you go into lecturing.
Depending on the research avenue you go there’s both field and lab work.
As company’s try to become more environmentally friendly there is a growing need for companies to reduce impact on environment so biologists are required here
Also in water contamination and conservation of food stocks such as fish/ seafood is becoming increasing important

Additionally a growing population is causing constraints of food resources so it’s becoming more important for innovative food production and crops producing a better yield per hectare requirement as well as tolerances to pest/ diseases and environmental changes
What area of biology interests you?
